snippet: Jabbar Collins, who spent 15 years in prison for a Brooklyn murder he did not commit, reached one of the largest such settlements in recent history.
abstract: Jabbar Collins, who spent 15 years in prison for Brooklyn murder he did not commit, agrees to $3 million settlement approved with New York State; it is one of the largest such settlements in recent history.
lead_paragraph: Jabbar Collins, who spent 15 years in prison for a Brooklyn murder he did not commit, reached one of the largest such settlements in recent history.

headline.main: Wrongfully Convicted Man Takes $3 Million Settlement
headline.print_headline: Wrongfully Convicted Man Takes $3 Million Settlement
